channel.title: SRC Compiling Error
channel.description:
Compiling... javac: file not found: src\com\rs\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Finished. Press any key to continue . . .
Any help? Every time I try to compile the SRC.

item.title: SRC Compiling Error
item.dc:creator: @dun_dun_dun dun dun dun
item.description:
@dun_dun_dun wrote:

[quote=“Pure_, post:3, topic:546998”]Incorrect.

Javac is found, his source files are not. Make sure src/com/rs/ is populated.[/quote]

Alright, my bad then. Getting back into this, thanks for the info.

Read full topic

item.title: SRC Compiling Error
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“dun dun dun, post:2, topic:546998”]Try using the full directory that points to your javac. This could be
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.X.X_XX\bin\javac.exe
or
C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.X.X_XX\bin\javac.exe.
Be sure to replace the X’s with your version of Java.

If that still doesn’t work, make sure you have your Path and Classpath variables set.[/quote]Incorrect.

Javac is found, his source files are not. Make sure src/com/rs/ is populated.

Read full topic

item.title: SRC Compiling Error
item.dc:creator: @dun_dun_dun dun dun dun
item.description:
@dun_dun_dun wrote:

Try using the full directory that points to your javac. This could be
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.X.X_XX\bin\javac.exe
or
C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.X.X_XX\bin\javac.exe.
Be sure to replace the X’s with your version of Java.

If that still doesn’t work, make sure you have your Path and Classpath variables set.

Read full topic

Compiling…

Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
Finished.
Press any key to continue . . .

Any help? Every time I try to compile the SRC.
